summary: SmoX are happy to provide you an ULTRA PERFORMANCE FANTASY ENB, with vivid colors, beautiful skies, dark (not to much) & colorful nights, amazing-looking days, and all of that with a very little FPS drop!
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=5][font=Arial][color=#000000]S[/color][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][font=Arial]mo[/font][color=#000000][font=Arial]X[/font][/color][/font] are happy to announce...[/size]

[b][size=5][font=Arial][color=#000000]S[/color][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][font=Arial]mo[/font][color=#000000][font=Arial]X
[/font][/color][/font][/size][/b][color=#1e84cc][size=6]Fantasy
[/size][/color][color=#f1c232][size=6]Performance[/size]
[/color][size=5]ENB [i]v[/i]2.0!
[/size]
[/b][size=3][i]For ENB v0.265[/i][/size][/center]

[url=http://www.siz.co.il/][img]http://up410.siz.co.il/up1/hrhbzjdmnmzd.png[/img][/url]

[size=4][center]Ok guys, we know we didn't upload or update anything for a long while now, but we are now happy to present you with Version 2.0 of our Fantasy Performance ENB preset! about the same performance cost but with much more beautiful scenes![/center][/size]


[size=6]Description
[/size]
[size=3]This ENB preset from SmoX is a fantasy preset, very vibrant, colorful and beautiful, but it has a very little performance cost (relatively).
This ENB was built by US from scratch,  and it was created and tested on my lame PC (created originally for it) - thus low performance was our top priority, second only to colorful, vibrant, and full of life look for the game!
Credit for the other guys who made it  possible in the end of the post![/size]

[size=6]Colorful Edition vs Standart Edition
[/size][size=3]While colorful Edition aims at continuing with the original ENB feel of "over-vibrant" colors and really unrealistic 'vividness', [/size]
[size=3]the Standart Edition tries to keep the original preset feel while making less eyes-bleed - It is less vibrant.[/size]

[b][size=4]PICTURES[/size][/b]

[size=4][b][center][font=Trebuchet MS][i]Colorful Edition[/i][/font]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/treqqkseh/full/][img]http://s4.postimg.org/4ldsjqr4d/TESV_2015_02_22_12_39_49_58.jpg[/img]
[/url][url=http://postimg.org/image/64idg7cg9/full/][img]http://s4.postimg.org/hguyxzl59/TESV_2015_02_22_12_44_58_18.jpg[/img][/url]
[font=Verdana]
Standart Edition
[url=http://postimg.org/image/46744gukp/full/][img]http://s4.postimg.org/58han0de5/TESV_2015_02_22_12_40_51_87.jpg[/img][/url][/font]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/54s2khxah/full/][img]http://s4.postimg.org/ommq0fu8d/TESV_2015_02_22_12_45_15_36.jpg[/img][/url][/center][/b][/size]


[size=6]Installation[/size]

[list=1][*][size=3]Download the mod[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Download ENB from [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm[/url] (use matching version for mod)[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Open up the[b] ENB series [/b]zip, go to [b]WrapperVersion[/b], and extract[b] [/b]all the files in there[b] [/b] into your [b]Skyrim directory[/b], [size=3]where your TESV.exe is (example: C:\Program Files (x86)\The Elder Scrolls V Skyrim)[/size]
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Extract everything from the [b]mod [/b]zip file into your [b]Skyrim directory[/b] [/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Go to My Document -> My games ->[b] SkyrimPrefs.ini[/b] and edit as follows:

[Display]
bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
bTreesReceiveShadows=1
bDrawLandShadows=1
bShadowsOnGrass=1


[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Return to your Skyrim directory (from step 2), and edit [b]enblocal.ini[/b] as follows:

[MEMORY]
ReservedMemorySizeMb=64 ...[b] //For video cards with 2GB or more VRAM, 512 is a good baseline. For less VRAM, 256 can work better.[/b]
VideoMemorySizeMb=0      [b]// Replace 0 with your VRAM[/b]

[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Open up Skyrim launcher and [u]disable[/u] [b]Anti-Aliasing[/b] and [b]Anistropic Filtering[/b][/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]
[b]DONE![/b][/size]



[size=6]Performance Cost[/size]

[size=3]As said, this ENB preset IS very light on performance cost, but it's relatively speaking, remember it still is an ENB! That being said, MY OWN experience with this preset is as followed!

[b]MY GEAR:
[/b][/size][list][*][size=3][b]I5 2400[/b] 3.1GHz[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]GTS 450  1GB VRAM[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]4GB RAM[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3][b]
MY RESULTS:
[/b]My FPS [b]BEFORE [/b]was [b]45-60[/b] [b]Exterior [/b](Location Depending),[b] 50-60 Interior[/b]
My FPS [b]AFTER [/b]is [b]40-50[/b] [b]Exterior [/b](with possible drops down to [u]35 on REALLY HEAVY locations[/u]), and [b]45-55 Interior[/b]
My game runs on Meduim-High Quality![/size]

[size=6]Recommended Mods[/size]

[size=3]It is very recommended to use this mods with this ENB preset, as they are also very light on performance cost, and look very good in combination with it

[/size][list][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D1111%26preview%3D&pUp=1][size=3]Pure Water[/size][/url][/*]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54515/?]Realistic Skystars[/url][/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Lush Trees And Grass (not available anymore) [/size][/*]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49547/?]TK ENB[/url]'s Weather esp - VERY RECOMMENDED! (you don't need the preset just the esp file)[/size][/*]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12525/?]Dynavision[/url]
[/size]
[/*]
[/list]


[size=6]Credits

[/size][list][*][size=3][b]Boris [/b][b]Vorontsov[/b] - for creating ENB! [url=http://enbdev.com/]http://enbdev.com/[/url][/size][/*]
[*][size=3][b]killeror22 (SmoX)[/b] - for creating this preset, designing & testing it![/size][/*]
[*][size=3][b]roeed97 (SmoX)[/b] - for helping in creation, performance tweaking, and advising![/size]
[/*]
[*][size=3][b]tamu75[/b] - for the TK ENB weather esp file - used in the photos![/size][/*]
[/list]



[b][size=3]Please leave comments with feedback, We'd really appruciate it and want to hear what you think! THANKS! :)[/size][/b]
author: SmoX

files.name: SmoX Fantasy Performance 1.01
files.changelogHtml:
Deleted ENB binaraies, now you need to seperately download them
Fixed too bright lights at days
Nights are a tiny bit brighter

files.name: SmoX Fantasy Performance 1.50 Standrat Edition
files.changelogHtml:
Added bloom
A little performance boost, counters with bloom
Treated lightning at all situations - ajusted curves and intesity(ies)

files.name: SmoX Fantasy Performance 1.50 Colorful Edition
files.changelogHtml:
Added bloom
A little performance boost, counters with bloom
Treated lightning at all situations - ajusted curves and intesity(ies)

files.name: SmoX Fantasy Performance 1.60 Standart Edition
files.changelogHtml:
Tweaked bloom & reduced it overall
Changed, improoved & tweaked fog greatly! Inc. reset intesity, color & saturation
Tweaked skies, horizon in particular - esspecialy at sunset
Improved sun's glow & color
Tweaked exterior night lightning
Improoved & tweaked exterior day color filter!
Disabled sunglare for a tiny FPS boost. Not needed in my opinion (not for performance at least)
Tweaked ColorPow a bit overall (stronger colors & darker shadows)
Tweaked nightskies stars & aura a bit in intensity & curve

files.name: SmoX Fantasy Performance 1.60 Colorful Edition
files.changelogHtml:
Tweaked bloom & reduced it overall
Changed, improoved & tweaked fog greatly! Inc. reset intesity, color & saturation
Tweaked skies, horizon in particular - esspecialy at sunset
Improved sun's glow & color
Tweaked exterior night lightning
Improoved & tweaked exterior day color filter!
Disabled sunglare for a tiny FPS boost. Not needed in my opinion (not for performance at least)
Tweaked ColorPow a bit overall (stronger colors & darker shadows)
Tweaked nightskies stars & aura a bit in intensity & curve

files.name: SmoX Fantasy Performance 2.0
files.changelogHtml:
Tweaked Lightning GREATLY! both int. and ext., and at all times - more direct lightning depandant, less ambient lightning effection
Tweaked skies a bit - especialy the horizon-sky line
HUGE night upgrade - crisper, "blacker" filling night, but still visible and playable without a torch, also gave it blueish tone and generally tweaked colors at night to get more color-contrast between reds and blues (beautiful magenta spots)
Blueish tone to shadows
Sunset & sunrise tweaked GREATLY in filters, colors, etc...
Tweaked fire at all situations
Tweaked lightsprite at all situations
Tweaked effect.txt - improved black & white levels, overall colors & saturation, and gave a little more crisp to shadows
Improved fog so distant terrain wont look like a blueish blot, now connects with the sky a lot nicer
